= Installing Barcamp CMS =

*Step 1*: Install Wordpress 2.6 

*Step 2*: Copy the wp-allauthors.php to Wordpress root directory

*Step 3*: Install the following plugin

           [http://akismet.com/ Akismet]

           [http://blog.jodies.de/archiv/2004/11/13/recent-comments/ Get Recent Comments]

           [http://www.song-line.de/2008/05/25/plugin-list-all-authors/ List-all-authors]

           [http://picandocodigo.net/programacion/wordpress/list-category-posts-wordpress-plugin-english/ List category posts]

           [http://www.theblog.ca/wplogin-redirect Peter's Login Redirect]

           [http://urbangiraffe.com/plugins/redirection/ Redirection]

           [http://skullbit.com/wordpress-plugin/register-plus/ Register Plus]

           [http://wordpress.org/support/topic/221525 Show authors without posts]

           [http://thedeadone.net/download/tdo-mini-forms-wordpress-plugin/ TDO Mini Forms]

           [http://www.phpvrouwen.nl/twitme Twitme]

           [http://smashingmagazine.com Twittar]

           [http://www.ilfilosofo.com/blog/wp-db-backup WordPress Database Backup]

           [http://alexking.org/projects/wordpress WordPress Mobile Edition]

           [http://blog.2i2j.com/plugins/wordpress-thread-comment Wordpress Thread Comment]

           [http://wp-cms.com/our-wordpress-plugins/post-control/ WP-CMS Post Control]

*Step 4*: Place the Barcamp Bangalore theme into the /wp-content/themes folder

*Step 5*: Activate all plugins and theme mentioned and customize them for your use

*Step 6*: Configure your "Add a Session" Page using the TDO Mini Forms plugin: Create a new form and add Content, Tag, CustomField and Categories fields using form widgets. Name the custom fields as 'session_embed'. 

If you face any issues get in touch with us on the bcb mailing list at bangalore_barcamp@yahoogroups.com [http://groups.yahoo.com/group/bangalore_barcamp group page]
